sentences.sContent: All attempts to control inflation have failed.
sentences.sCn: 控制通货膨胀的所有努力都失败了。

sentences.sContent: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.sCn: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

sentences.sContent: ...The scientists suggest this may be an attempt to calm humans down...
...there is simply no reason for anyone to attempt to deny her right to start anew...

phrases.pCn: 想做做不到的事；缘木求鱼

remMethod.val: at(表加强) ＋ tempt(诱惑， 考验) → 试图引诱别人 → 尝试

trans.tranOther: an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
to try to do something, especially something difficult
